instructions: Register your E911 address at My T-Mobile. From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . If necessary, tap the Wi-Fi switch to turn on Wi-Fi. Tap Call . Tap the Wi-Fi Calling switch to turn on Wi-Fi calling.
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Call . Tap Wi-Fi Calling . Tap Connection Preferences . Select one of the following options: Wi-Fi Preferred Cellular Network Preferred Never use Cellular Network
